post.body: Sure man. Just so you know, Im typing this using my....... I hope I dont give you nightmares. NIGHTMAYRES I TELLS YA!
Me too. *drools* ...wait, what?
Link PLZ? kthx.
Uhm well yeah can you email me a better pic? He looks fluffy and.. GAYDOM YAY!
I DEMAND A NSFW TAG! MY BOSS WAS JUST BEHIND ME, and I actually heard her smirk. Goddamn.
IM AT WORK, GAWDDAMMIT!
It actually looks like Ade sucking on a big black... Ok I shut up nao.
I thought porn-surfing was number 1?
Attempting to renew my now non-existent online life. O hai gais.
youtube just got blocked by IT. Oh well, back to work then.
PAYDAY tiem. YAY.
Everybody here twits about their testicles @nightdreamer, mine actually does the typing half the time.
Hi there, @nightdreamer 's testicles. "Hang out" here often? HUHLOLZ
Hai gais, anyone ever ordered anything from shopkami.com? The gadgets look really cool. And nerdy.
Oh hai gais, need a date? http://tinyurl.com/6oku97
so the SPAM box of gmail also has this ad: "Spam Imperial Tortilla Sandwiches - To serve, cut each roll in half" What a LOLies, this gmail
Summer rain = Weemmin in bikinis heading for shelter = BOOO.
questionablecontent.net's sooo my kind of humor. Sarcasm and murderous intent galore YAY!
Slooooooow day. *Yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaawn*
With You by Chris Brown's kind of an OKAY song but when Mr. Gay Bastard across my desk starts singing it loudly, NOT COOL.
